snippet: Lawyers for Dzhokhar Tsarnaev, the defendant in the 2013 Boston Marathon bombings, made a last-ditch effort late Wednesday to move the trial out of Boston.
abstract: Lawyers for Dzhokhar Tsarnaev, who will go on trial for 2013 Boston Marathon bombings, ask for change of venue or, at minimum, for Judge George A O'Toole Jr to hold hearing on moving trial out of Boston.
lead_paragraph: Lawyers for Dzhokhar Tsarnaev, the defendant in the 2013 Boston Marathon bombings, made a last-ditch effort late Wednesday to move the trial out of Boston.

headline.main: Massachusetts: New Effort to Move Bombings Trial
headline.print_headline: Massachusetts: New Effort to Move Bombings Trial
